name: VNFaceLandmarks2D
desc: A collection of facial features that a request detects.

items.name: var allPoints: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing all face landmark points.

items.name: var faceContour: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that trace the face contour from the left cheek, over the chin, to the right cheek.

items.name: var leftEye: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that outline the left eye.

items.name: var rightEye: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that outline the right eye.

items.name: var leftEyebrow: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that trace the left eyebrow.

items.name: var rightEyebrow: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that trace the right eyebrow.

items.name: var nose: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that outline the nose.

items.name: var noseCrest: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that trace the center crest of the nose.

items.name: var medianLine: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that trace a vertical line down the center of the face.

items.name: var outerLips: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that outline the outside of the lips.

items.name: var innerLips: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing points that outline the space between the lips.

items.name: var leftPupil: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing the point where the left pupil is located.

items.name: var rightPupil: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D?
items.desc: The region containing the point where the right pupil is located.
